description: A massive solar storm struck Earth 14,300 years ago, now confirmed as the most powerful ever recorded. Finnish scientists detected it through carbon-14 spikes in Ice Age tree rings. Over 500 times stronger than the 2003 Halloween Storm, this ancient event redefines solar risk and highlights the growing need to safeguard modern infrastructure against space weather threats.
title: Ancient 14,000-Year-Old Solar Storm Revealed as Strongest Ever Recorded in Earth’s History

description: In a groundbreaking discovery, scientists have documented capuchin monkeys abducting baby howler monkeys on Jicarón Island, off Panama's coast. The study, published in Current Biology on May 19, 2025, highlights 11 abduction cases, four of which were fatal.
title: Capuchin Monkeys Abduct Baby Howler Monkeys on Panama’s Jicarón Island, New Study Reveals

description: Devika & Danny is a Telugu Romantic Drama Series that stars Ritu Varma and Surya Vashishta in the lead roles. The plot revolves around a mysterious prediction by the priest made for another love interest of Devika, while she is preparing for her wedding. Will this prediction change her life? Will she fall for Danny? Watch only on JioHotstar, streaming from June 6th, 2025.
title: Devika & Danny OTT Release Date Revealed: When and Where to Watch It Online?

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover has reached Krokodillen, a 73-acre plateau near Jezero Crater's rim believed to host some of Mars’ oldest rocks. Preliminary data shows signs of clays, carbonates, and olivine minerals, suggesting ancient water activity. Currently examining a site named Copper Cove, the rover is using a new sampling strategy that allows unsealed rock cores to be swapped later for more compelling samples. With biosignatures found elsewhere on Mars in 2024, Krokodillen could provide deeper insight into the Red Planet’s environmental history and potential past habitability.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Explores Mars' Oldest Rocks in Krokodillen Region

description: A recent study by researchers from the U.S. and Mexico using data from the HAWC Observatory has confirmed that TeV halos are a universal feature of middle-aged pulsars. These extended regions of gamma-ray emission are significantly larger than pulsar wind nebulae and may help identify otherwise undetectable pulsars. The findings challenge existing models of particle propagation in the Milky Way and open new paths for astronomical research. Detailed studies of individual TeV halos are planned to further explore how high-energy particles behave around these cosmic objects.
title: New Study Confirms TeV Halos Are Common in Middle-Aged Pulsars

description: A new study by researchers at Brown University and the University of Bern used machine learning to analyze 86,000 high-resolution images of Mars. Their findings suggest that recurring slope lineae (RSLs)—dark streaks once thought to indicate liquid water—are actually caused by dry processes like wind and dust movement. With over 500,000 features mapped, this is the most extensive slope streak analysis to date. The results challenge past assumptions about Martian habitability and reduce concerns about contamination in future missions, helping narrow exploration targets using AI-driven insights.
title: New Study Uses AI to Reveal Dry Origins of Mars’ Mysterious Slope Streaks

description: Earth’s 26,000-year axial precession gradually shifts the celestial pole, replacing Polaris with new North Stars over millennia. Stars like Thuban, Kochab, Errai, and Vega have taken turns guiding humanity, and more will follow. According to NASA, gravitational forces cause this cosmic wobble, reminding us that even the seemingly constant night sky is ever-changing.
title: Polaris Wasn’t Always the North Star: How Earth’s Wobble Shifts the Celestial Pole

description: Scientists warn that Earth remains exposed to solar storms due to missing early data on its magnetic fields. Current satellites offer just minutes of warning, limiting our ability to protect power grids, satellites, and GPS systems. Without broader solar observation from multiple angles, a major storm could cause catastrophic disruptions, emphasising the pressing need for improved space weather forecasting.
title: Scientists Warn of Inadequate Solar Storm Forecasting: What You Need to Know

description: Netflix’s Sneaky Links: Dating After Dark premieres May 21, 2025. This daring reality series invites six singles and their past hookups to live together and face their romantic truths. Hosted by Chloe Veitch and Spicy Mari, it promises emotional twists and bold dating drama
title: Sneaky Links: Dating After Dark Now Streaming on Netflix: What You Need to Know

description: On May 20, 2025, SpaceX successfully launched its 60th Falcon 9 mission of the year from Cape Canaveral Space Force Station using a brand-new booster, B1095. The rocket lifted off at 11:19 p.m. EDT from Launch Complex 40, carrying 23 Starlink V2 Mini satellites into low Earth orbit. Notably, 13 of these satellites are equipped with Direct to Cell technology, designed to provide satellite-based mobile phone connectivity in remote and underserved areas. This was the first flight for booster B1095, which completed a smooth landing on the droneship Just Read the Instructions just eight minutes after launch. The mission highlights SpaceX’s continued innovation in satellite communication and booster reusability, expanding the ever-growing Starlink megaconstellation, now with over 7,500 active satellites.
title: SpaceX Successfully Launches 23 Starlink Satellites on Brand-New Falcon 9 Rocket

description: Major telecom providers such as Bharti Airtel, Reliance Jio, and Vodafone Idea (Vi) offer a variety of affordable recharge packs for prepaid subscribers in India. Several prepaid recharge plans by Airtel, Jio, and Vi bundle free access to over-the-top (OTT) platforms such as JioHotstar, enabling subscribers to watch films, shows, and live sports on a single device via a mobile-only plan without paying an additional price. In this article, we will cover the best prepaid recharge packs offered by Airtel, Jio, and Vi which also bundle OTT services to help you pick the most affordable option.
title: Airtel vs Jio vs Vodafone Idea (Vi): Most Affordable Prepaid Plan With OTT Benefits

description: One of the highest rated games of 2024 is coming to Game Pass next week. Microsoft has announced the second wave of titles joining the subscription service in May and the first week of June. Highlights include Atlus’ acclaimed RPG Metaphor ReFantazio, Tales of Kenzera: Zau and Tom Clancy’s The Division 2.
title: Metaphor: ReFantazio Joins Xbox Game Pass in May; Microsoft Announces Retro Classics Collection

description: The US stablecoin bill has advanced to the House of Senate for the final approval. Dubbed the Guiding and Establishing National Innovation for US Stablecoins (GENIUS) Act, this legislation aims to set clear rules around the issuing and management of stablecoins in the US.
title: What is US' Stablecoin-Focussed GENIUS Act: Everything to Know

description: Apple has updated its list of vintage and obsolete devices to include two more iPhone models — iPhone 7 Plus and iPhone 8. These smartphones are now considered outdated and their service and repairs will be limited. The Cupertino-based tech giant usually discontinues hardware service for certain products that are technologically obsolete due to difficulty in sourcing parts and carrying out repairs, although it still continues to support them through software updates.
title: iPhone 7 Plus and iPhone 8 Added to Apple's Vintage and Obsolete Products List

description: Motorola has finally confirmed a launch date for its Razr 60 in India. The company has also revealed the colourways and RAM and storage options of the Indian variant. The Motorola Razr 60 will go on sale through Flipkart in the country. It was unveiled in global markets last month with a MediaTek Dimensity 7400X chip. The Razr 60 offers an IP48-rated build and a 4,500mAh battery.
title: Motorola Razr 60 Set to Launch in India Next Week; Specifications Revealed

description: Signal, the popular privacy-focused messaging platform, rolled out a security feature on Wednesday to counteract Microsoft’s Recall feature. The new feature, dubbed Screen Security, will prevent devices from capturing screenshots of the application’s window. The San Francisco-based company said it was forced to take such drastic measures as Microsoft left it with limited options to protect the privacy of its users.
title: Signal’s New Update Prohibits Microsoft’s AI-Powered Recall Feature From Taking Screenshots

description: The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop packs a 14-inch 3K OLED display that offers decent colours. It also features a powerful AMD Ryzen AI 9 HX 370 processor that can deliver powerful performance, while Nvidia GeForce RTX 5070Ti provides a seamless gaming experience.
title: Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 (2025) Review: Power-Packed Performance in Compact Size

description: OpenAI announced its acquisition of Jony Ive’s artificial intelligence (AI) hardware startup io on Wednesday. Just hours after that, Sam Altman reportedly revealed information about the secretive AI device the two companies are building. As per the report, the under-the-wrap device is not a smartphone, or a wearable such as smartglasses.
title: OpenAI’s Sam Altman Reportedly Hints at New AI Device Being Developed With Jony Ive

description: Tecno Pova Curve 5G is confirmed to launch in India soon. Tecno has shared teasers on social media to offer details about the phone's design. ​The Tecno Pova Curve 5G will be available in two colourways with a curved AMOLED display and will come with several AI-based features. Tecno will sell the Pova Curve 5G exclusively on Flipkart. It is confirmed to feature a triangular-shaped camera module at the rear.
title: Tecno Pova Curve 5G India Launch Date Confirmed; to Be Available on Flipkart

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) has introduced a new add-on feature to its Family Postpaid plans on Thursday. With this update, users can add up to eight secondary members to their existing family plan at Rs. 299 per member. This enhancement aims to provide a convenient way for customers to add family members to their existing Vi Family plan.
title: Vodafone Idea Updates Family Postpaid Plans to Let Users Add Up to 8 Additional Members

description: Vodafone Idea (Vi) on Tuesday announced a new recharge plan for its prepaid subscribers in Kolkata and select other circles. Dubbed ‘Nonstop Hero’, it offers truly unlimited data, unlimited voice calls, and other benefits — all bundled in a single package. The telecom operator has rolled out several variations of the Nonstop Hero prepaid recharge plan with varied benefits and validity, the latter ranging from 28 days to 84 days.
title: Vodafone Idea (Vi) Rolls Out ‘Nonstop Hero’ Plan With Truly Unlimited Data, Calls in Kolkata and Other Circles

description: Amazon is testing a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature designed to make users’ shopping experience more convenient. Dubbed audio product summaries, the AI-powered feature lets users listen to a short highlight about the product. The Seattle-based e-commerce giant said the audio clip has two or more AI-generated shopping experts discuss various aspects of the product to help users understand if it is the right choice for them or not.
title: Amazon Begins Testing AI-Powered Audio Product Summaries Feature on Its Platform

description: Mistral released a new coding-focused artificial intelligence (AI) model on Wednesday. Dubbed Devstral, it is an open-source coding agent that can perform software development tasks. The Paris-based AI firm says that, unlike other open software engineering (SWE) agents, this model can solve real-world software engineering problems and write contextualised code in a codebase.
title: Mistral Releases Devstral, an Open-Source Agentic Coding AI Model That Outperforms GPT-4.1 Mini

description: Sony is winding down its PlayStation Stars loyalty program that rewarded members for playing games on its platform. The program is no longer accepting new members but will fully shut down on November 2, 2026, the company said Wednesday.
title: Sony to Fully Shut Down PlayStation Stars Loyalty Program Next Year

description: Computex 2025, Asia's biggest tech event, has become an epicentre of tech-related announcements. Nvidia, Foxconn, DeepSeek, Xiaomi and Huawei are among companies that stole the spotlight at the event with their plans and announcements.
title: Computex 2025: Five Takeaways From Asia’s Biggest AI Tech Show

description: The Department of Telecommunications (DoT) will share Financial Fraud Risk Indicator (FRI) data with financial institutions, including banks and UPI providers. This FRI metric, developed by the Digital Intelligence Platform, classifies mobile numbers into three risk levels linked to financial fraud. PhonePe is an early adopter, using FRI data to alert users through its 'PhonePe Protect' feature.
title: DoT to Share Financial Fraud Risk Indicator Data With Banks, UPI Service Providers and Financial Institutions

description: Infinix Xpad GT has been launched in select global markets on Wednesday alongside the Infinix GT 30 Pro 5G smartphone. The new gaming-focused GT-branded tablet runs on a Snapdragon 888 chipset alongside 8GB RAM and 256GB storage. The Infinix Xpad GT boasts a 13-inch display with a 2.8K resolution and packs a 10,000mAh battery.
title: Infinix Xpad GT With Snapdragon 888 SoC, 10,000mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: LinkedIn is rolling out a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will let users look for ideal roles easily. The Sunnyvale, California-based professional networking platform released the AI job search tool in the US earlier this month. It is now expanding its access globally, including in India. The AI tool will let professionals type the desired role as a natural language query, and it will find and show relevant roles.
title: LinkedIn Introduces AI-Powered Job Search Tool That Supports Natural Language Search Queries

description: OpenAI is acquiring Jony Ive's startup, io Products, for $6.5 billion (roughly Rs. 55,850 crore). Ive was the chief designer behind early iPhone models. He has now been appointed as creative head of the firm to shape AI-focused devices for the future.
title: OpenAI Buys iPhone Designer Jony Ive's AI Device Startup, Names Him Creative Head

description: Realme has disclosed the launch date of the Neo 7 Turbo in China. The Chinese tech brand has also teased the design, colour options, and key specifications of the new Neo series smartphone. It is confirmed to ship in two colour options with MediaTek's recently announced Dimensity 9400e chipset under the hood. The Realme Neo 7 Turbo will be offered in a semi-transparent design.
title: Realme Neo 7 Turbo Launch Date Revealed; Colour Options, Chipset Details Teased

description: Samsung’s Galaxy Z lineup this year is going to be an interesting one for several reasons. The book-style foldable, the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 is set to get a bigger display, while the upcoming Galaxy Z Flip clamshell style foldable is said to get minor updates, there’s also a new FE model which showed up in the rumour mill recently. New information now claims that the Galaxy Z Flip 7 could be powered by an Exynos SoC.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 to Arrive With Samsung’s First 3nm Chip After Skipping the Galaxy S25 Series: Report

description: Bitcoin and Ether, both registered notable gains on Thursday, May 22. The overall crypto market cap rose by 3.56 percent in the last 24 hours. Bitcoin created a new historic all time high, touching $111,593 (roughly Rs. 95.6 lakh) amid supportive developments brewing in the US and other parts of the world.
title: Bitcoin Surpasses $111,500 to Set New All-Time High; Majority of Altcoins Follow Suit in Market Rally

description: Dyson PencilVac has been launched in Japan. The vacuum cleaner is marketed as the slimmest offering in the market to date, featuring a 38mm diameter handle which houses all of the electronics powering it. It is equipped with Fluffycones which prevents the collected hair from getting entangled. Dyson PencilVac is omnidirectional with four circular brushes which, along with the suction motor, helps deliver optimal cleaning. The company claims it can reach surfaces as low as 9.5cm and has an operation time of up to 60 minutes.
title: Dyson PencilVac With Slim Design and Up to 30 Minutes Operation Time Announced

description: Google is developing a new desktop experience for Android, the company announced at its I/O 2025 developer conference on Tuesday. It is collaborating with Samsung to build upon the foundations laid by Samsung DeX — short for Desktop eXperience, to improve the desktop windowing capabilities not just phones and tablets powered by Android, but also for an expanding range of devices across form factors and features. It aims to provide a more desktop-oriented experience when devices are connected to external displays.
title: Google Confirms Android 16 Will Offer Desktop Experience Inspired by Samsung DeX

description: Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2, the action-adventure title that released on Xbox and PC last year, is finally coming to PlayStation 5 this summer, developer Ninja Theory announced Wednesday. The sequel to 2017’s Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice will launch on PS5 in an “enhanced” package that includes new features.
title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2 Coming to PS5 This Summer With New Features

description: Apple is reportedly planning to let third-party developers build apps using its proprietary artificial intelligence (AI) models. As per the report, the Cupertino-based tech giant wants to open its AI model, which also powers Apple Intelligence features, in hopes that more AI-powered apps appear on its marketplace. With more apps that use AI capabilities, the company is said to believe that it could invigorate consumer interest in devices that offer Apple Intelligence.
title: Apple to Reportedly Allow Developers to Use Its AI Models for App Creation at WWDC 2025

description: Honor 400 series is scheduled to be launched in the European markets today (May 22) comprising Honor 400 and Honor 400 Pro models. Ahead of its anticipated debut, Honor has announced that both smartphones will be introduced with six years of Android updates. As part of its long-standing collaboration with Google, the company will offer artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities on the Honor 400 series powered by the Veo 2 video generation model, enabling users to turn images into short videos.
title: Honor 400 Series to Get Six Years of Android Updates, AI Features Powered by Google’s Veo 2

description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic has been rumoured to get a redesign and now we have the first glimpse of how it could look. Recently surfaced renders reportedly tease a new “squircle” design of the smartwatch similar to the flagship Galaxy Watch Ultra, which replaces the previous circular design. While the Galaxy Watch 8 Classic is expected to retain signature elements like a rotating bezel, it may benefit from an additional button which may potentially add more functionality.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Classic CAD Renders Tease New Squircle Design, Extra Button: Report

description: Microsoft could equip its Xbox handheld gaming console with a custom AMD processor, according to a tipster. The news comes weeks after Asus teased the arrival of an Xbox-branded handheld. This development comes as Microsoft also prepares for its next-gen gaming console launch in 2027.
title: Xbox Handheld Gaming Console to Arrive With Custom AMD Processor, Tipster Claims

description: Xiaomi 15s Pro will be launched in China on May 22 alongside the Xiaomi Pad 7 Ultra tablet and Xiaomi YU7 SUV. As we wait for the formal reveal, Lu Weibing, Xiaomi Group partner and President, has teased the design and key specifications of the smartphone. The Xiaomi 15s Pro is teased to come with a periscope telephoto camera.
title: Xiaomi 15s Pro Design, Camera Details Teased Ahead of Launch; Confirmed to Get Periscope Telephoto Camera
